Articles.Content:
Hello, everybody!

I have a few problems with mods installation and setup.

Help me, please!

How to make MechJeb work properly with Raster Prop Monitors mod?

I have both of them installed in the game and placed on the command pod I am sitting in, and when I hit the autopilot key, I see a blank page with a single prompt saying 'No autopilot software installed'.

What can I do with that?

The ScanSat page says 'No satellite connection', but I can not check if that is correct as I have no mapping satellites in orbit yet.

If I install KSI MFD pack I get a 'MOD' menu with pages for ScanSat and SASS, but both are completely blank. How to make the monitors display, for example, the docking camera information or some other third party mods stuff, much like it is made with the ALCOR capsule?

P.S By the way, who knows what pod is used as a cone shape command module on the ALCOR capsule screenshots?

This should probably go in the RPM Thread.

I will tell you this: Check your install and make sure both Mechjeb and RPM are the latest versions.

While your question may get addressed in here, your best bet for a quick answer about mods will be to post on the mod's specific thread. Or in here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/13-Add-on-Requests-and-Support

Here is a thread that is tracking most mod updates: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74457-ARM-Pack-0-23-5-Mod-Compatibility-Thread

Also, I think you double posted.

All the mods are the very latest versions.

Also, did I mention, that I am trying to get that working on the stock command pods?

Do I need to adjust any settings in that case?

How to make MechJeb work properly with Raster Prop Monitors mod?

RPM v 0.16 and MechJeb 2.2.1 (the one linked in the MJ OP) are compatible. If you use any dev builds of either, it will break compatibility.

The ScanSat page says 'No satellite connection', but I can not check if that is correct as I have no mapping satellites in orbit yet.

You need to have a SCANsat part on your vessel to open the SCANsat RPM page. Put some scanning satellites in a polar orbit and then check your RPM SCANsat page. Also, RPM only works with build 5 of SCANsat, not the technogeeky/DMagic updates

If I install KSI MFD pack I get a 'MOD' menu with pages for ScanSat and SASS, but both are completely blank. How to make the monitors display, for example, the docking camera information or some other third party mods stuff, much like it is made with the ALCOR capsule?

That's something you have to ask of Hyomoto, the author of KSI. If you want more docking info on the docking camera screen, you'd need to edits its page text to include it. As for the blank screens, see my first paragraph - the latest dev builds of any of the three are not compatible with each other.

P.S By the way, who knows what pod is used as a cone shape command module on the ALCOR capsule screenshots?

I think it's the stock Mk1-2 pod but if you're getting that, you haven't installed the ALCOR IVA and props correctly (or at all). I think you mean in the IVA anyway... that's the only cone thing I've seen with ALCOR...

Can you please post some links to the correctly compatible versions?

I have tried many different links including both releases and development builds, so I think something might be messed up already. My module manager plugin and the core game itself are also the very latest versions. I get the same result on both Mac and Windows.
